projects.title: Q-Kart
projects.desc1: An android platform for home delivery of goods on the same day from nearby shops.
projects.desc2: Technologies & Tools : Android Studio, Firebase Authentication, Firebase Realtime Database, Firebase Storage, Google Maps API

projects.title: Gamezone
projects.desc1: A collection of games made with HTML, CSS & Javascript.

projects.title: Contestaholic
projects.desc1: A web app developed using HTML, CSS, and JS to get the schedule of all coding competitions.

projects.title: Easy Biz
projects.desc1: An android distribution management system to help suppliers deliver efficiently.
projects.desc2: Technologies & Tools : Android Studio, Firebase Authentication, Firebase Realtime Database, Firebase Storage, Google Maps API

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.desc1: An android 2 player tic tac toe game.
projects.desc2: Technologies & Tools : Android Studio, Firebase Authentication, Firebase Realtime Database, Firebase Storage, ZXing
